short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classic checkers. The game has a simple and intuitive interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We all know this game - classic checkers. The game has a simple and intuitive interface. Excellent graphics. This game is not for those who give up without a fight, but for the hard-nosed and persistent people.
